participant_1.background:
I have a good relationship with my parents, although we don't always agree on everything.
My first paycheck bought me a soccer ball and my time is too valuable for Comic Con.
I started a blog where I share my thoughts and feelings on topics I am passionate about.
I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad.
I'm not sure if I could be a fashion designer if I were blind, because I would have a hard time seeing the colors and textures of fabrics.

participant_2.background:
I lost everything when the economy crashed.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, casual clothing that lets me move freely while I play music and write stories.
i recently moved to florida.
i really enjoy hiking.
I am not married, but I love planning weddings.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just hanging out and relaxing today.
That's good to hear! I'm just getting ready to go for a hike.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love hiking. Where are you hiking?
I'm hiking in the Florida Everglades. I just moved here recently, and I'm really enjoying the nature here.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to the Everglades.
You should definitely come! It's beautiful here.
I will definitely have to check it out sometime.
I'm sure you'd love it. What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I like to write, play music, and spend time with my friends and family.
Those all sound like great things to do! I love to write too. What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and piano. I also like to sing.
That's so cool! I love to sing too.
